Name: Cannibal Chickens
About the game: EVEN CHICKENS LOVE THE TASTE OF CHICKEN!!! On the Isle of So-fee, immortal chickens have an appetite for....well, other chickens! During a feeding frenzy, they will scramble to eat each other in one gulp. It's okay, though, as they just get reborn at a nest! Features -Set the time limit in options. -Choose from 8 playable chickens. -Play on one of 5 maps. -Jump on or Dash into another chicken to eat them! +1 point for eating, -1 point for being eaten! -Crow to boost your point gain for your next meal x3! Be careful, if you are eaten while crowing, you lose 2 points! -If you are eaten, respawn at one of 4 nests on the map at random. -At the end of the frenzy (time limit), the chicken with the most points wins! -UPDATE! Now with AI Players!
